description.lang: This Smart Smoke Alarm could detect smoke produced in fire and issue photoelectric alarms to alert peopleand at the same time, it will send alarm information to the user APP. This alarm has mini stylish design,high sensitivity and long lifespan.
Include command classes: Battery report, Notification report, and Device Reset Locally notification

The Sensor sends a Basic Set command to directly trigger devices (like a light, switch, etc.) in response to events. The value of the Basic Set command (e.g. Siren trigger) is configured usingsmoke or no smoke
